title: How Pro Cyclists Come Back Faster from Broken Collarbones than You
content:
Egan Bernal was training on open roads less than a week after he fractured his clavicle at Clásica Jaén. Here's how pros are returning to the bike so fast.

Read the full article at How Pro Cyclists Come Back Faster from Broken Collarbones than You on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
